backend/main.mo: Actor exposing simple health check and version query endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend config, hooks, components, and crypto feature files.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file documenting the crypto refresh interval variable with defaults and constraints.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: App HTML entry point mounting the React root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component rendering header, crypto dashboard, theme toggle, and backend health logging.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button component that switches between light and dark themes using useTheme.
frontend/src/features/crypto/CryptoDashb: Main dashboard with tabs, auto-refresh interval control, overview and prices views, and full market data rendering.
frontend/src/features/crypto/CryptoPrice: Compact list component for the Prices tab showing rank, icon, name, symbol, and EUR price with skeleton states.
frontend/src/features/crypto/cryptoRefre: Helper validating and exposing the effective crypto data refresh interval from environment variables.
Utility functions formatting EUR prices, market cap, and volume values.
frontend/src/features/crypto/RefreshInte: Button-group selector offering preset refresh intervals and emitting controlled value changes.
frontend/src/features/crypto/types.ts: Type definitions for crypto asset objects and market data responses.
frontend/src/features/crypto/useCryptoMa: Fetches top 50 crypto market data from CoinGecko, filters and maps it to CryptoAsset, and exposes it via a React Query hook with configurable refresh interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides backend health and version queries using the current actor, enabled only when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Stores and toggles a light/dark theme, syncing it with localStorage and applying the theme class to the document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global typography and color settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended theming using CSS variables, custom fonts, and plugins for typography, queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, architecture decisions, known issues, and implemented features for the crypto tracking web app.
